props.name: uploads

props.name: via_followup_source_id

props.name: updated_stamp

create-ticket.description: Create a new ticket in Zendesk.

props.name: subject
props.description: The subject of the ticket (optional - will use first comment text if not provided)

props.name: comment_body
props.description: The comment body (text). Use this for plain text comments.

props.name: comment_html_body
props.description: The comment body (HTML). Use this for HTML formatted comments. If provided, this takes precedence over Comment Body.

props.name: requester_email
props.description: Email address of the ticket requester. If not provided, the authenticated user will be the requester.

props.name: requester_name
props.description: Name of the ticket requester (used when creating a new user).

props.name: assignee_email
props.description: Email address of the agent to assign the ticket to.

props.name: priority
props.description: The priority of the ticket.

props.name: type
props.description: The type of ticket.

props.name: status
props.description: The status of the ticket.

props.name: tags
props.description: Array of tags to apply to the ticket.

props.name: external_id
props.description: An external ID for the ticket (useful for integrations).

props.name: collaborator_emails
props.description: Array of email addresses to add as collaborators.

props.name: follower_emails
props.description: Array of email addresses to add as followers.

props.name: due_at
props.description: The date and time when the ticket is due.

props.name: custom_fields
props.description: Custom ticket field values

props.name: comment_public
props.description: Whether the comment is public (visible to the requester). Defaults to true.

props.name: forum_topic_id
props.description: The ID of the forum topic associated with the ticket.

create-user.description: Add a new user to the Zendesk instance.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the user

props.name: email
props.description: The primary email address of the user

props.name: role
props.description: The role of the user. Defaults to "end-user" if not specified.

props.name: organization_name
props.description: Create and associate user with a new organization by name (alternative to Organization ID)

props.name: phone
props.description: The phone number of the user

props.name: alias
props.description: An alias displayed to end users

props.name: details
props.description: Additional details about the user

props.name: notes
props.description: Internal notes about the user

props.name: external_id
props.description: A unique external ID for the user (useful for integrations)

props.name: time_zone
props.description: The time zone of the user (e.g., "America/New_York")

props.name: locale
props.description: The locale of the user (e.g., "en-US")

props.name: verified
props.description: Whether the user is verified

props.name: active
props.description: Whether the user is active. Defaults to true.

props.name: shared
props.description: Whether the user is shared from a different Zendesk Support instance

props.name: shared_agent
props.description: Whether the user is a shared agent from a different Zendesk Support instance

props.name: moderator
props.description: Whether the user has forum moderation capabilities

props.name: suspended
props.description: Whether the user is suspended

props.name: restricted_agent
props.description: Whether the agent has restrictions on what tickets they can access

props.name: only_private_comments
props.description: Whether the user can only create private comments

props.name: report_csv
props.description: Whether the user can access CSV reports

props.name: skip_verify_email
props.description: Skip sending a verification email to the user

props.name: ticket_restriction
props.description: The ticket restriction for the user

props.name: signature
props.description: The user's signature for email responses

props.name: tags
props.description: Array of tags to apply to the user

props.name: user_fields
props.description: Custom user field values

props.name: identities
props.description: Array of identity objects with type and value. Example: [{"type": "email", "value": "test@user.com"}, {"type": "twitter", "value": "username"}]
